title: Résumé vs Eulogy Virtues of Trump, Falwell, Bill Maher, and the Evangelical Clergy
description:
David French wonders if the Evangelical clergy are set for a big crash. Seems likely to me. Why? We're in a period of transition and modernity is fading. Peek modernity pitted eulogy virtues and résumé virtues against each other. We see this in Trump and Jerry Falwell Jr. Bill Maher, for all his anti-religion assumes deep eulogy virtues. How do we move forward?
